# No Padding, No Problem
## Objetivo
Oracles can be your best friend, they will decrypt anything, except the flag's ciphertext. How will you break it? Connect with `nc mercury.picoctf.net 2671

## Soluciòn


```

```shell
┌──(kali㉿kali)-[~]
└─$ nc mercury.picoctf.net 2671.
Welcome to the Padding Oracle Challenge
This oracle will take anything you give it and decrypt using RSA. It will not accept the ciphertext with the secret message... Good Luck!


n: 
e: 65537
ciphertext: 


Give me ciphertext to decrypt: 
Here you go: 580550060391700078946913236734911770139931497702556153513487440893406629034802718534645538074938502890769430290200460554490

```

```python
 >>> 
>>> e=65537
>>> 
>>> x=pow(2,e,n)
>>> c * x

>>> 
>>> from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes
>>> long_to_bytes(m)
>>>m=580550060391700078946913236734911770139931497702556153513487440893406629034802718534645538074938502890769430290200460554490 // 2
>>> m

>>> long_to_bytes(m)
b'picoCTF{m4yb3_Th0se_m3s54g3s_4r3_difurrent_5814368}'

```
picoCTF{m4yb3_Th0se_m3s54g3s_4r3_difurrent_5814368}
